last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: With time running out and suspicions running wild within SIU, Carver must clear Major's name and thwart the killer's final revenge.

name: Code 404
overview: In the near future, an undercover Detective Inspector gunned down and killed during a botched sting is brought back via an experimental Artificial Intelligence project. Full of glitches, he’s got to track down the person who shot him, prove himself as a cop so as not to get shut down, and save his marriage and his friendship, all with his partner Carver to boot.

seasons.name: Series 1
seasons.overview: John Major had it all: wife, best friend, glittering career in the police force... when his cover was blown and he met an untimely death. One year later, he's back - part AI and better than ever... or so he'd like to believe. Full of glitches, he's got to track down the person who shot him, prove himself as a cop so as not to get shut down, save his marriage and his friendship with his partner to boot.

seasons.name: Series 2
seasons.overview: Having cracked The Juggler case with his long-suffering partner, the resurrected DI Major has finally reached his potential as the top cop in the SIU. But it came at a price. At last realising that his best friend had shacked up with his wife Kelly while he was “away” (and a bit before), their partnership is over, and the pair go their own ways. But when a 20-year old cold case is reopened, the pair find themselves back together and thrown into the action. With an impending divorce, the return of his long-time absentee dad, and danger around every corner, the pressure seems to be getting to Major and he starts exhibiting strange behavioural glitches. However, much to Carver’s concern, the problems are more serious than a typical reboot can solve, and our cyborg hero may be looking at terminal failure.

seasons.name: Series 3
seasons.overview: On limited duties pending an investigation into their last case, Detective Inspectors Major and Carver find themselves at an all-time low. So, when one of their own within SIU is murdered, Major and Carver become hellbent on solving the case and proving their worth. But it’s bigger than they thought... They discover they’re dealing with a twisted serial killer whose sights are now set on them. With lives at stake, they need to work together, but tensions run high and fractures in their partnership begin to worsen. Can they hunt them down before it’s too late?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Top cop John Major is killed after a failed operation. But then the Met brings him back - as an AI prototype.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Major screws up during an investigation and Carver wonders whether to turn him in. But when he learns of the consequences, he decides to cover for him.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: After he and Carver are given a new assignment by Dennett, a suspicious Major prefers to stake out Kelly's work as he has a hunch she's been seeing someone else.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The pressure is on in the latest assignment and failure could mean it's shutdown for Major once and for all...

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: To Carver's bewilderment, Major reveals that he is going to move back in with Kelly. Parfit discovers disturbing information in the AI Ethics files.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: With Major's AI finally living up to the hype, Carver and Kelly come clean about their relationship. The team lies in wait to catch The Juggler.

1.name: Series 1
1.overview: John Major had it all: wife, best friend, glittering career in the police force... when his cover was blown and he met an untimely death. One year later, he's back - part AI and better than ever... or so he'd like to believe. Full of glitches, he's got to track down the person who shot him, prove himself as a cop so as not to get shut down, save his marriage and his friendship with his partner to boot.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Major, Carver and Kelly have gone their separate ways. Things are looking up for the AI-enhanced Major, whilst Carver is gunning for a promotion and is knee deep in a new case.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Carver and Major receive new information on the Chelsea Bridge Case – a £50 million robbery committed twenty years ago by a gang who seemed to vanish into thin air.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: DCS Dennett officially reopens the Chelsea Bridge case, reuniting Major with his absent father, Clifford, who failed to solve the case 20 years earlier. As Major's AI becomes increasingly unstable, Dr. Parfit and Carver clash over the solution.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Major's glitchy AI seriously impacts his police work. Dr. Parfitt's solution to Major's problems lead to a troubling realisation for Dennett.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Carver deals with an unstable Major, and Dennett calls in a favour from Millikan Biotech. When the detective inspectors are assigned to a witness protection case with some familiar faces, Carver learns shocking truths and confronts Major.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: When Carver and Kelly find a collapsed Major with just three hours left to live, they try to get him to accept the truth. Major is determined to solve the Chelsea Bridge case and exonerate his dad before his AI shuts down.

2.name: Series 2
2.overview: Having cracked The Juggler case with his long-suffering partner, the resurrected DI Major has finally reached his potential as the top cop in the SIU. But it came at a price. At last realising that his best friend had shacked up with his wife Kelly while he was “away” (and a bit before), their partnership is over, and the pair go their own ways. But when a 20-year old cold case is reopened, the pair find themselves back together and thrown into the action. With an impending divorce, the return of his long-time absentee dad, and danger around every corner, the pressure seems to be getting to Major and he starts exhibiting strange behavioural glitches. However, much to Carver’s concern, the problems are more serious than a typical reboot can solve, and our cyborg hero may be looking at terminal failure.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Major and Carver reunite, but tensions remain high. When a police officer is murdered, Carver becomes hell-bent on solving the case, Major has an epiphany and resolves to become a better man, and both detective inspectors are out to prove themselves.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: With a serial killer at large, Major and Carver call on the help of forensic psychologist Professor McAllister. Parfit worries about Major's AI updates.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Major faces an outside threat to his AI, and Carver contends with a serial killer's twisted games.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Major and Carver begin to close the net on the killer when a witness provides a shocking revelation.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Chalmers, the former police commissioner who has plagued Major since the day he was reanimated, faces trial. With Major busy testifying, Carver is running out of time to decipher the latest clue and save the killer's next target.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: With time running out and suspicions running wild within SIU, Carver must clear Major's name and thwart the killer's final revenge.

3.name: Series 3
3.overview: On limited duties pending an investigation into their last case, Detective Inspectors Major and Carver find themselves at an all-time low. So, when one of their own within SIU is murdered, Major and Carver become hellbent on solving the case and proving their worth. But it’s bigger than they thought... They discover they’re dealing with a twisted serial killer whose sights are now set on them. With lives at stake, they need to work together, but tensions run high and fractures in their partnership begin to worsen. Can they hunt them down before it’s too late?
